content: dusty peach cardigan + hat usa terms i used debbie bliss baby cashmerino shade 340068 3 x 50g ita a lightwight dk not quite 4 ply the band suggests 3 25 hook/needle but i ve used it with no problem on size 4mm 0-3 months 5ply/sport weight 150g 375m chest - 18 4mm/g hook length from shoulder 9 5 3 buttons sleeve from armhole 6 needle gauge half_double_crochet half_double_crochet chain chain 17hdc x 14rows over 4x4inch double_crochet double crouchet slip_stitch slip_stitch st stitch single_crochet single_crochet group 3hdc in one stitch ch55 row 1 half_double_crochet in 3rd chain from hook half_double_crochet in next 9 3hdc in next st half_double_crochet in next 6 3hdc in next st half_double_crochet in next 18 3hdc in next st half_double_crochet in next 6 3hdc in next st half_double_crochet in next 9 row 2-10 ch2 half_double_crochet in each st across placing 3hdc in the centre st of each group from previous row row 11 ch2 half_double_crochet to centre of the first group place 1 half_double_crochet here then skip to next group place 1 half_double_crochet in the centre st of the group half_double_crochet in each to the next group across back place 1 half_double_crochet in centre skip to next half_double_crochet group place 1 half_double_crochet in centre half_double_crochet to end armholes made row 12 - 26 ch2 skip1 1dc in next stitch 1 double_crochet in skipped stitch* repeat from * to* to end 1dc in last stitch ch2 from last row turn edging ch2 double_crochet in each st to corner 1dc and 2sc in last st 2sc in each row end up the front edge 2sc in corner st 1dc in each st around neck 2sc in next corner 2sc in each row end down front edge 1sc in double_crochet slip_stitch to top of ch2 no button hole band is needed small buttons will fit through the stitches sleeve x 2 row 1 join yarn under the armhole with a slip_stitch ch2 + 1dc in same stitch 1dc in each to end join in first double_crochet row 2 - 13 ch3 *skip1 1dc in next stitch 1 double_crochet in skipped stitch* repeat from * to* to end join in top of ch3 row 14 ch2 1dc in same place * 7dc decrease* repeat 3 times double_crochet in remaining stitches join to first double_crochet fasten_off weave in ends + attach buttons finished items may be sold pattern is not for resale all contents © 2014 sinead deegan designs all rights reserved hat join rounds to first double_crochet not ch2 magic_ring round 1- ch2 12dc in ring join to first double_crochet with slip_stitch round 2- ch2 2dc in bottom of ch2 2dc in each st to end join round 3- ch2 2dc in bottom of ch2 1dc in next st * 2dc in next st 1 double_crochet in next st* repeat from *to* to end join round 4- ch2 2dc in bottom of ch2 1dc in next 2 sts * 2dc in next st 1 double_crochet in next 2 sts* repeat
